Uses of Interface
io.wcm.caravan.pipeline.extensions.hal.client.action.HalClientAction

  • Packages that use HalClientAction 
    Package Description
    io.wcm.caravan.pipeline.extensions.hal.client.action
    HAL Client Pipeline Actions.

    • Uses of HalClientAction in io.wcm.caravan.pipeline.extensions.hal.client.action

      Classes in io.wcm.caravan.pipeline.extensions.hal.client.action that implement HalClientAction 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractEmbedLinks
      Base link embedding action to load links for a given relation and store them as embedded resources.
      class  DeepEmbedLinks
      Action to load all links for a given relation in a HAL document and store them as embedded resources.
      class  EmbedLink
      Embeds only one link for the given relation and index as embedded resource.
      class  EmbedLinks
      Action to load one or all links of the main HAL resource and insert the content as embedded resource(s).
      class  FollowLink
      Action to load a HAL link and replace the current resource by the loaded one.
      class  LoadLink
      Action to load a HAL link.
      Methods in io.wcm.caravan.pipeline.extensions.hal.client.action that return HalClientAction 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      HalClientAction HalClientAction.setCacheStrategy​(io.wcm.caravan.pipeline.cache.CacheStrategy cacheStrategy)  
      HalClientAction HalClientAction.setExceptionHandlers​(List<io.wcm.caravan.pipeline.JsonPipelineExceptionHandler> exceptionHandlers)  
      HalClientAction HalClientAction.setHttpHeaders​(com.google.common.collect.Multimap<String,​String> httpHeaders)  
      HalClientAction HalClientAction.setLogger​(org.slf4j.Logger logger)  
      HalClientAction FollowLink.withHttpMethod​(String httpMethodToUse)  
      HalClientAction LoadLink.withHttpMethod​(String httpMethodToUse)
